tool_description: Detaied Google Play API. Search, Suggest, Category Search, Dev Data, App Data etc.
name: Google Play API (Detailed)
title: Google Play API (Detailed)

api_list.name: Get App Permissions
Get App Datasafety
Get App Reviews
Get Similar Apps
Get Apps From Dev
Apps From Category
Get Ages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-play-api-detailed.p.rapidapi.com/get_ages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-play-api-detailed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
